About.about-p1: Hi! I'm 31 years old, from Brazil, delivering solutions since 2021.
About.about-p2: Fell in love with programming when I started a fullstack development course. That was my first glance on the tech area, besides gaming, making me hungry for knowledge.
About.about-p3: Nowadays, I'm commited to improve my skills as a developer while I search for a new opening.
About.about-p4: I'm always aiming to deliver the best possible solution.

list.i1: Developed features and provided maintenance to a legacy quality management platform.
list.i2: Applied general knowledge and learned more about platform related Development/Support skills and quality processes.

list.i1: Contributed as a frontend developer on the team responsible for developing a language learning platform, taking responsibility for implementing new features, creating layouts based on designs in Figma, and continuously maintaining the platform.
list.i2: Developed features including document management, teacher and student management, scheduling, as well as creating pop-ups, modals, banners, and other solutions for marketing promotions.
list.i3: Collaborated with two other developers who were responsible for the backend and frontend support.
list.i4: Actively participated in agile methodologies (Scrum), including sprint planning, code reviews, and pair programming.
list.i5: Developed solid skills in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and modern frameworks, aiming for the effectiveness and evolution of the platform.

list.i1: Development and integration of layouts based on designs in Figma for a language learning platform.
list.i2: The routine consisted of dailies and weeklies for task alignment, pair programming, and code review, guided by a senior developer. Every month, we held 1-on-1 meetings to discuss learnings and tips for improving soft skills.

list.i1: üë®‚Äçüíª Mentorship: Guiding junior developers, teaching essential programming skills such as Next.js, TypeScript, Axios, React Query, and Node.js. Practiced pair programming to promote collaboration and mutual learning, emphasizing a mobile-first development approach.
list.i2: üîß Project Management: Project management following agile methodologies and SCRUM. Task management through GitHub, with daily meetings to ensure project progress and alignment with objectives.
list.i3: üé® UI Design: Translating designs from Figma into responsive interfaces using React, Next.js, Ant Design and Tailwind CSS, focusing on mobile-first design principles. Emphasizing user experience to prioritize usability and accessibility across all devices.
list.i4: ‚ú® Code Excellence: Utilizing clean, efficient and sustainable code standards. Collaborating with frontend developers through code reviews to share knowledge and ensure code quality, with special attention to performance optimization on mobile devices.
list.i5: üåê Deployment and Infrastructure: Maintaining CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for secure and scalable solutions. Integrating OAuth for user authentication and authorization, ensuring data security and user privacy on mobile platforms.

content.description: E-mail and content are required fields.
